section.title: Exercise: Using the SWT browser widget

section.para: In this exercise you will display Google Maps in an SWT Browser widget.

note.para:
This exercise does not always work on a Linux system because on certain Linux versions the Browser widget does not work. See the Eclipse SWT FAQ answered at
How do I use the WebKit renderer on Linux-GTK for details.
